name: Running Cup
description:
'RunningCup - crazy soccer' is a soccer themed running game playable by everyone, filled with slapstick action and zany humor.

From the creators of Jumpy Witch, well received for its stylish and beautiful world, brings to you another game with its own original style and wacky action humor.

Last chance in over time and you're the one with the ball! Will you be able to skip past the on-rushing defense? How far will you make it to the other side of the field with unique and menacing challengers all rushing your way.

​• How to play
- Tap to Jump
​- Swipe down to slide
- Swipe up to jump
- Use the appropriate move to go past defenders.

​•​ Features
- Use intuitive touch and swipe controls to go past defenders
- High thrill and excitement delivered with minimum controls.
- 20 different kinds of wacky skills
- Unlock each skill by clearing missions
- 6 different defenders, each with their own defensive style
- 5 different kits to wear
- Support for ranking and achievements

Are you curious? Download now to find out!
